mapper.select:
SELECT TM.code, TM.lastUpdateDate, TM.lastUpdateOperatorId, TM.name, TM.testInt, TM.testLong, TM.type, TM.createDate, TM.createOperatorId, TM.remark, TM.nested1Id, TM.nested2Code, TM.attributes, TM.description FROM TEST_TESTMODE2 TM WHERE
AND TM.code = #{code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEST_TESTMODE2 ( code, lastUpdateDate, lastUpdateOperatorId, name, testInt, testLong, type, createDate, createOperatorId, remark, nested1Id, nested2Code, attributes, description ) VALUES ( #{code}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{lastUpdateOperatorId}, #{name}, #{testInt}, #{testLong}, #{type}, #{createDate}, #{createOperatorId}, #{remark}, #{nested1.id}, #{nested2.code}, #{attributes}, #{description} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM TEST_TESTMODE2 WHERE
AND code = #{code}
mapper.update:
UPDATE TEST_TESTMODE2
lastUpdateDate = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
lastUpdateOperatorId = #{lastUpdateOperatorId,javaType=java.lang.String},
name = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
testInt = #{testInt,javaType=int},
testLong = #{testLong,javaType=java.lang.Long},
type = #{type,javaType=com.tx.generator2test.model.TestTypeEnum},
remark = #{remark,javaType=java.lang.String},
nested1Id = #{nested1.id,javaType=java.lang.String},
nested2Code = #{nested2.code,javaType=java.lang.String},
attributes = #{attributes,javaType=java.lang.String},
description = #{description,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE
AND code = #{code}
